room.EnterResponse: You put the gun to your head.
room.Description:
You take a last breath. your memories are comming back.. part by part.. you were at this point befor. It does not matter what you do. Your decicions are meaningless. You will always end back in that one office
Just let me rest allready
You pull the trigger
Congratulation you found the second ending. To start a new game write: new game.
